titles.title: Take me in the Holy of Holies

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Take me past the outer courts
Into the Holy Place
Past the brazen Alter
Lord, I want to see Your face

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Pass me by the crowds of people
The priests who sing Your praise
I hunger and thirst for Your righteousness
But it's only found in one place

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Take me into the Holy of Holies
Take me in by the blood of the Lamb
Take me into the Holy of Holies
Take the coal, touch my lips, here I am

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bring me in the Inner court
And past the golden light
Through the incense altar
Lord I long to see your light

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Let me touch the coloured curtain
And clothed in linen white
And part the veil that's hanging
That keeps you from men's sight.
